snippet: Sixty-two officers and soldiers loyal to the son of former President Ali Abdullah Saleh were charged with resisting the authorities and mutiny, a senior Yemeni security official said Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Sixty-two officers and soldiers loyal to the son of former President Ali Abdullah Saleh were charged with resisting the authorities and mutiny, a senior Yemeni security official said Thursday.

headline.main: Yemen: Members of Elite Force Face Mutiny Charges
headline.print_headline: Yemen: Members of Elite Force Face Mutiny Charges
